Headline: යුනියන් කාරයන්ට කංචන ගහන්න පන්නලා (බ්‍රහස්. කාටූන්)
News Content: යුනියන් කාරයන්ට කංචන ගහන්න පන්නලා (බ්‍රහස්. කාටූන්)

comments.comment: In 1956, for illnesses and symptoms the remedy was Nationalization.Now it is privatization.Is 1956 revolution a total failure ?Not for the goons who entered politics from poor families and became billionaires overnight. Even Candrika Bandaranayake privatised [sold] government ventures against her fathers much celebrated policies.This clearly shows that we did not have visionary leaders.The copycat leaders do things by looking at others as and when problems start.
HOW ABOUT PUBLIC TRANSPORTTION  PRIVATE BUS ...  ARE THEY GOOODD???  WE ARE STILL NOT ANSWERING THE REAL PROBLEMS
